<abstract>
  <para>This chapter focuses on how to manage, store, preserve, and deliver content, and more, via the following main topics:</para>
    <itemizedlist>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="Platform_User_Guide.Organize_Content.Structure_Content">Structure content</link>
          </emphasis>
		</para>
		<para>Introduction to types of drives and views, functions on action tabs, actions on folders and documents, and content administration.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="Platform_User_Guide.Organize_Content.Manage_Content">Manage content</link>
          </emphasis>
		</para>
		<para>How to contribute content, and to manage content (for example, creating/editing/publishing/deleting content).</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="Platform_User_Guide.Organize_Content.Newsletter">Manage newsletters</link>
          </emphasis>
		</para>
		<para>Information of newsletter viewer and newsletter manager, and actions which can be done on the newsletter manager.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="Platform_User_Guide.Organize_Content.Manage_Workflows">Manage workflows</link>
          </emphasis>
		</para>
		<para>Introduction to the default processes, including holiday and pay raise, and how to create and manage these processes. Also, this section also focuses on how to upload or view details of a process.</para>
      </listitem>
    </itemizedlist>
</abstract>
